AWdfh">Reservation is exzellent, rememberance email inclusive. Book early, because they are ful.
The restaurant itself is in a house with the original rooms, so no more than 4-5 tables in a room.
The service is excellent, our waiter was Louis. The menue cards were in spanish and english via free WiFi.
Wait for the delicious and nicely decorated dishes. Absolutely fantastic. From fish to meat to vegetarian. Good drinks both non+/ alcoholic.
Enjoy your stay.

data-test-target="review-title"><span><div class="biGQs _P SewaP OgHoE"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/ShowUserReviews-g309293-d26501860-r1028109100-Amana-San_Jose_San_Jose_Metro_Province_of_San_Jose.html" class="BMQDV _F Gv wSSLS SwZTJ FGwzt ukgoS">Amana never misses: spectacular food and service</a></div></span></div><div class="biGQs _P SewaP AWdfh"><div class="VufqL o W">Aug 2025&nbsp;&nbsp;Couples</div></div><div class="Fbwxz" data-test-target="review-body"><div class="_T FKffI bmUTE"><div class="fIrGe _T bgMZj" style="-webkit-line-clamp: 7; line-break: normal; cursor: pointer;"><div class="biGQs _P VImYz AWdfh"><span class="JguWG"><div class="biGQs _P VImYz AWdfh">Nothing beats an Amana dinner!  

Weve always had a 5/5 experience in every category: food, service, vibes, drinks, and dcor, and our latest visit was no exception. From the moment we walked in, we felt welcomed, as if entering a friends home. The warm lighting instantly set the mood, encouraging us to relax, smile, take a seat, and enjoy the flawless service and food.

We started with the aji &amp; goldenberry tiradito. Since we love goldenberries, this was a real treatthe combination of aji, the citrusy goldenberry, and the freshness of the fish made for a spectacular starter.

The grilled chicken was delicious, with a great mix of textures and flavors that we really enjoyed. The crispy pork belly was an unexpected highlightperfectly balanced, with every bite offering a wonderful experience.

The drinks were spot on. Our favorite is the cas gimlet, so refreshing!

To wrap it up, something Ive noticed about every Amana dish is that the ingredients are never combined just for show. Each pairing feels intentional and results in something truly delicious, which isnt always the case with other culinary concepts. We absolutely love it here. Amana is hands down our favorite restaurant!</div></span></div></div><div class="lszDU" style="line-height: 24px;"><button class="UikNM _G B- _S _W u _T c G_ wSSLS wnNQG" type="button"><span class="biGQs _P ezezH">Read more</span><div class="CECjK _W"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20px" height="20px" class="d Vb UmNoP" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M18.4 7.4 12 13.7 5.6 7.4 4.2 8.8l7.8 7.8 7.8-7.8z"></path></svg></div></button></div></div></div></div><div class="MRPew Pj PX Pw PJ Q2 Re B1 Z BF _c"><div class="OHOex H5"><span class="xtcbX _T"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20px" height="20px" class="d Vb UmNoP" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11.868 1.782a.75.75 0 0 1 .75.75v1a.75.75 0 1 1-1.5 0v-1a.75.75 0 0 1 .75-.75m7.245 3.286a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.06l-.707.708a.75.75 0 1 1-1.06-1.061l.706-.707a.75.75 0 0 1 1.061 0m-14.446.035a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0l.707.707a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 1.061l-.707-.707a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.06M9.96 7.968c-1.423 1.147-1.706 2.518-1.496 3.823.218 1.362.981 2.645 1.624 3.399l.18.21v1.292h4.05v-1.238l.121-.186c.904-1.39 1.454-2.897 1.49-4.211.034-1.284-.415-2.357-1.506-3.067-1.795-1.168-3.716-.51-4.463-.022m-.86-1.23c1.014-.68 3.637-1.635 6.142-.005 1.61 1.047 2.233 2.663 2.187 4.364-.043 1.602-.673 3.298-1.61 4.798v2.297H8.77v-2.247c-.725-.915-1.533-2.34-1.785-3.917-.283-1.76.134-3.713 2.067-5.253l.024-.02zm-5.807 6.03a.75.75 0 0 1 .75-.75h1a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-1a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75m14.914 0a.75.75 0 0 1 .75-.75h1a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-1a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75m-7.929 7.342v.608h4.036v-.608zm-1.5-.65c0-.47.381-.85.85-.85h5.336c.469 0 .85.38.85.85v1.846a.98.98 0 0 1-.308.7.8.8 0 0 1-.542.212H9.628a.8.8 0 0 1-.542-.212.98.98 0 0 1-.308-.7z"></path></svg></span><span class="biGQs _P SewaP ezezH">Insider tip:</span></div><div class="biGQs _P VImYz AWdfh">Not sure about a dish? plan a trip around</div><div class="biGQs _P alXOW wSaDS GzNcM xlVsI UTQMg NnDYw qWPrE lidCj"><div class="">While travelers around the world may be familiar with Rio's Carnival and Mexico's Dia de los Muertos celebrations, there are plenty more festivals worth traveling for across Latin America. The lineup is robustfrom a breathtaking Guatemalan kite festival to the ultimate polar-bear plunge in the freezing waters off the Falkland Islands. Each one of the below celebrations offers unique moments of joy and a special opportunity to dig into cultural experiences with local communities.
